name: United 🔗
description:
Gather your mates and run from the cops (or take them down). This build is unfinished in terms of content/mechanics, but fully playable.

This was my entry for the GMTK game jam 2021, you can rate it here.

Controls: ActionsKeyboardGamepadMoveWASD, ZQSD or Left/right arrowsD-Pad or Left stickAttackSpace or EnterX or Square button (▢)

We do recommend a controller if you have one :)

Team:
  • Colin Bellino: programming, art, design ( https://colinbellino.com )
